# bk-skeleton

Customisable skelton.

```javascript
import { html } from 'lit-html'

html` <bk-skeleton width="300" height="300" radius="0" /> `
```

&nbsp;

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                              | Type     | Default |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `height` | `height`  | Height of the skeleton. Value is treated in pixels                                                       | `number` | `16`    |
| `radius` | `radius`  | Border radius of the skeleton. Value is treated in pixels                                                | `number` | `0`     |
| `width`  | `width`   | Width of the skeleton. The value is treated in pixels except if it is <= 1 will be treated as percentage | `number` | `1`     |

---
